description: Defines the Log entity class for the application, mapping to the 'logs' table, with properties such as id, user, logDate, title, and createdAt, including JPA annotations for ORM functionality.

classes.name: Log
classes.description: Entity class representing a log entry, including references to a User, timestamp, title, and log date.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the log entry.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Sets the User associated with this log.

methods.name: getLogDate
methods.description: Returns the date of the log.

methods.name: setLogDate
methods.description: Sets the date of the log.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the log.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the log.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the log was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp for the log.
